Posts.Content: Oct 9, 2008 11:59AM Cinzia wrote: I did A/C and now I am doing taxol.  I found the muscle pain to be much worse with the tax, but it's only for one or two days.  I think the emotions might be from the steroids.  They pump me up and just let me crash.  Let you doc know about the emotional stuff and they may be able to adjust the steroids for any easier crash.  Hang in there I know it sucks, but this will all be behinds us someday. cinzia
Posts.Title: Pain !!!!! physical and emotional mamakaren kris60
